file_content.text: Jedi filth... you've killed my son!
She'll pay with her life, my master. I swear it.
He'll die for this, master. I'll see to it personally.
You've no idea what you've unleashed, Jedi. There's no place in the galaxy to hide from my wrath.
I've sworn to protect the Republic. I took no pleasure in your son's death.
Tarnis gave me no choice.
I don't fear you. Come find me whenever you like.
I won't be hiding.
Tarnis was weak. I spared you future embarrassment.
You should thank me.
I will inflict unimaginable suffering on your people. Billions will die because of you.
We already control your secret weapon facilities. All that power is ours, now.
My son's death will be avenged on the entire Republic--and you will bow down before I let you die.
Your grudge is with me alone. There's no need to hurt others.
Don't punish the innocent.
As they die, you will suffer--and I want you to suffer before the end comes.
You're insane.
I see where your son got his overconfidence. You'll die just like he did.
I'll kill you all.
My hatred makes me stronger than you can possibly know.
Tell your pathetic Masters that Darth Angral has returned. This time, there will be no mercy.
Such a charmer. I miss him already.
The Planet Prison is officially scrap metal. Looks like we saved Coruscant.
Couldn't have done it without you, Kira.
You fought bravely.
Now we have a new problem: Darth Angral.
It's not over yet.
At least we won't get bored.
You were just along for the ride, Padawan.
This victory was all mine.
I wanted to help, but your ego kept getting in my way.
Much as I'm enjoying these toxic ruins, maybe we should get back to the Senate tower?
We'll meet again, Jedi. That is a promise.
